summary: Lostwolf coin website with a roadmap showing DEX soft launch on March 31st and Tier 1 exchange launch 3 months later
architectural_notes: Homepage includes roadmap section with visual timeline
Launch button serves as both visual indicator and interactive element that opens modal/expands section with detailed launch information
Roadmap shows two phases: DEX soft launch (March 31st) and Tier 1 exchange launch (~3 months later)

existing_features.title: Add a new roadmap section on the homepage that displays a prominent Launch button showing the DEX soft launch date of March 31st as a visual indicator

Make the Launch button clickable to reveal detailed Wolf Pack launch information including the soft launch on DEX (March 31st) with 'Initial Expansion of Wolf World' description and the Tier 1 exchange launch approximately 3 months later (end of June)
Integrate the new roadmap section seamlessly into the existing homepage layout using consistent styling, animations, and theme elements matching the wolf/pack aesthetic

new_feature_requests.summary: Add roadmap section on homepage with Launch button showing DEX launch date (March 31st) and Wolf Pack launch details
